name: Manjaro: Cup of Linux Edition
short_description:
Spatry's remix of Manjaro GNU/Linux! FEATURES:  Base XFCE Installation • BleuFear & Faenza Theme Set • Themed Drop Down Terminal • Compiz and Emerald with Spatry's Vibrant Configuration Settings • Complete Software Set • 32 & 64 Bit Editions!

Created by request from fans of the Cup of Linux show on YouTUBE. This release Was developed by Matthew Moore and Spatry.

Manjaro: Cup of Linux Edition is built on top of the stable branch of Manjaro XFCE. This gives you ease of use, stability and all of the benefits of Arch user repository. 

NEW! December 3, 2014 Version 0.8.11 By popular demand, KWIN is included in this release. Please see the release notes at http://www.cupoflinux.com/SBB/index.php/topic,2494.0.html for more details.
